Teste de velocidade para calcular de 1 até 1 bilhão, a partir do R.

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

options(scipen = 999)
knitr::knit_engines$set(julia = JuliaCall::eng_juliacall)
```

## R

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true 

library(tictoc)

sum_until_r <- function(numero = 10) {
    n <- 0
    while (n < numero) 
        n <- n + 1 
    n
}

tictoc::tic()
sum_until_r(1000000000)
tictoc::toc()
```

> 21.264 sec elapsed

## Python

```{python}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true 

# open python console in vim or rstudio 
# reticulate::repl_python()

import time

def sum_until_py(numero = 10):
    n = 0
    while(n < numero):
        n+=1
    return n

tic = time.perf_counter()
sum_until_py(1000000000)
toc = time.perf_counter()

print(toc - tic, 'secs')
```

> 25.6930 secs

## Julia from JuliaCall

end
